rows.label: tlk70000067_01_msg0001
rows.name:
When Ornella-san was here, the
village was so much more lively.
It's deserted these days...

rows.label: tlk70000067_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Sometimes people remember about
the village and come to visit.

rows.label: tlk70000067_01_msg0003
rows.name:
That's why I've been running my
inn here for so long. Someone needs
to welcome the folk that come.

rows.label: tlk70000067_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I want to make sure Ornella-san's
old house is safe and sound, too.
